title: Maladex: Algorithmic Swaps Protocol
description: Proposed Cardano DEX models are inefficient: have low capital efficiency, high impermanent loss, and are prone to struggle with concurrency.
solution: Maladex Algorithmic Automated Market Making (AAMM) sound and high capital efficiency concurrent protocol dynamically adjusting to market.
experience: Experienced Haskell developers with years of track in building advanced and scalable trading systems in leading financial institutions.
